Description.Text: Guests of this Gatineau hotel are welcome to enjoy many superior amenities, including free coffee, free parking, free local calls and a free weekday newspaper. The hotel also features an outdoor heated pool, picnic area, sauna, sundeck and poolside bar. The business traveler will especially appreciate voice mail, high-speed Internet access, data ports and access to the on-site business center with fax, copy and teleconference services and a computer with Internet. The hotel has eight meeting rooms able to accommodate up to 300 people. All well-appointed guest rooms come equipped with coffee makers, irons, ironing boards, hair dryers and cable television. Executive Suites also include robes, refrigerators, mini-bars and spacious work desks. Select rooms feature whirlpool bathtubs. Microwave and refrigerator rentals are available. Valet cleaning services are provided for guest convenience. The Clarion Hotel & Conference Centre is the perfect location for anyone visiting the Gatineau area. Come experience our blend of warm hospitality, convenient location and gracious accommodations. Here you will feel right at home.
